Title: Liverpool Six Community Centre
Location: Liverpool, North West England, United Kingdom
OrganizationDetails: Registered nonprofitDonations eligible for Gift Aid.
Description: I have set up a go fund me page. To offer my friends and family the opportunity to join me in supporting the L6 food bank.     Who not only provide food  tins  tea bags  sugar  nappies  wipes  toilet rolls  tampons  cleaning products. Basically everything that is no longer on the shelves in supermarkets.     But also they make healthy meals freeze them and deliver them to isolated vulnerable people throughout Liverpool area. Who are not able too leave their homes  can’t afford to put food on the table to their children or keep there homes clean.     I completely understand that not everyone is in a position to join me as we are all financially effected by the current situation we find ourselves in.     But I felt a strong need to try and raise some funds to help them and all they are trying to do. Please share my page love you all x     Thank you x     More information about Liverpool Six Community Association: At our Community Centre we provide advice services  lunch clubs  youth clubs  a foodbank  tea dances  short breaks away for the elderly and children. The children we work with come to the L6 Centre very distressed and hungry. We run a youth club for these disadvantaged children of our community and provide them with a hot meal 3 times a week. We work closely with the local schools and the teachers who refer vulnerable children and families. We also ensure we support families who are deprived.

Title: For shopping & toiletries
Location: North Shields, North East England, United Kingdom
Description: Didnt really want to do this but my Mams last payment off universal credit was in December. She lost her job last month  universal credit wouldnt allow her an advanced payment & gave her a food bank number so that's what shes been living off for a month along with my 17 year old brother. Shes waited a full month to be paid & their saying she is entitled to £0 once again cause they made a mistake in her last wage so now shes gonna have to live another month with no money & off foodbanks! Hate to do this but if anyone can donate even £1/2 it all adds up for some shopping & toiletries for her until next month. Thank you for taking the time to read this & she will appreciate it if anyone could help her.

Title: HELP THE HUNGRY
Location: Worcester, West Midlands, United Kingdom
Description: Every day people in the UK go hungry for reasons ranging from redundancy to receiving an unexpected bill on a low income. A simple box of food makes a big difference  with foodbanks helping prevent crime  housing loss  family breakdown and mental health problems. A food bank is a non-profit  charitable organization that distributes food to those who have difficulty purchasing enough to avoid hunger. Food banks rely solemnly on our goodwill and support alone it’s vital that we stand together to fight hunger. More and more people today are going hungry and if it wasn’t for food banks where would we go? The amount of people who depend on food banks just in 2019/20 are approximately 1.6 million in the United Kingdom  around 250 thousand more than the previous year. A quarter of 1 million Increase each year. I was completely blown away by the statics and I realise now that every single food bank in the UK are in such high demand and pressure to keep that many people alive. Please help me guys to keep these food banks highly stocked up with endless supply of food and drinks. You could change so many lives.

Title: Books for Foodbanks
Location: Batley, Yorkshire and the Humber, United Kingdom
Description: I need your help to raise money to provide great quality books for 40 children in the local area whose families are having to turn to a food bank for support with the basic necessities.     Books are not a luxury and every child should have the chance to own their own books - that is where you come in! I will provide the books to these families in August 2020   during the school holidays  so the sooner that we can fill the fundraiser the better!     If you are able to donate  that would be amazing! Anything at all that you can spare. As a teacher at a local primary school  I see the difference that books can make to children's lives everyday and I don't think it is right that some children don't have the chance to find the books that are right for them. Let's do something about it!

Title: Nominate a Key Worker & Donate to NAC Foodbank
Location: M J D & Sons (Scaffolding) Ltd, Scotland, United Kingdom
Description: During this unprecedented time Thistle Help would like to recognise one key worker (NHS nurse/doctor  carer  cleaner  retail worker etc) and in turn raise funds for North Ayrshire Food Bank.    All money raised will be donated to this worthwhile charity. The amount the chosen keyworker receives is totally up to you. If we raise under £200 we will give them a £50 voucher. If we raise over £200  they will receive a £100 voucher of their choice donated by Thistle Help.    Please detail who you are nominating in your message line with your donation. (If you have nominated someone on Facebook  this should be the same person for us to link it to the Facebook nomination please).    Nominations will close at 5pm on Friday  10th April 2020.  The chosen key worker will be announced on Facebook on Monday  13th April 2020.    Let's raise as much as we can for this worthwhile cause and recognise a true star in the process!    Thanking you in advance for your support...

Title: Hungry pets
Location: Cardiff, Wales, United Kingdom
OrganizationDetails: Registered nonprofitDonations eligible for Gift Aid.
Description: Do you want to join me in making a difference? I'm raising money in aid of PET FOODBANK SERVICE and every donation will help.     Pets are going hungry  as South Wales suffers extreme economic instability in the best of times  but we are still trying to recover from the devastating flooding and are now starting to feel the effects of the devastation from the coronavirus. I predict a recession next or at the very least economic instability for some time to come.    Having helped as many of the flood victims as we could  the Pet food bank service only has minimal pet food supplies left. We are watching the current disaster unfold  but with the supplies  we have the dilemma we face now is to choose between supporting the elderly or the homeless. Currently  without your support  we will be unable to assist people facing extreme financial crisis. Animal shelters may become over-loaded with pets that owners can no longer afford to feed  causing yet another crisis.    To try and help as many people as possible I am asking for an emergency donation to purchase pet food  the reason I am asking you is in extreme financial crisis people turn to charities for help. The wonderful people who normally donate to my charity are the very people who might  unfortunately  require help now. I also fear that most companies will also be unable to assist us  as they are struggling to survive and continue to support their staff.    Please help if you can.    Thank you in advance for your contribution to this cause that means so much to me.
